about_the_game:
As the world is ending around her, Samira must find a way to flee planet Earth and reunite with her family. As she searches for her ticket to safety, she’s mysteriously teleported back in time. Your puzzle solving skills will be put to the test as you work with an ancient companion by your side, Tiki, the scarab. This third-person, puzzle solving game will take you through an ancient African society where you speak with the ancient gods and goddesses to figure out why Samira’s world is ending. Will you be able to right the course of time or will planet Earth be destroyed forever?



Features:
  • Explore the land of Ahemfie and learn about an ancient African society
  • Discover the backstories of the characters around you
  • Solve innovative puzzles as you assemble pieces of the Tablet of Djehuti



  • Make life or death decisions that influence the course of your story
  • Harness ancient powers and use them to traverse the world
detailed_description:
As the world is ending around her, Samira must find a way to flee planet Earth and reunite with her family. As she searches for her ticket to safety, she’s mysteriously teleported back in time. Your puzzle solving skills will be put to the test as you work with an ancient companion by your side, Tiki, the scarab. This third-person, puzzle solving game will take you through an ancient African society where you speak with the ancient gods and goddesses to figure out why Samira’s world is ending. Will you be able to right the course of time or will planet Earth be destroyed forever?



Features:
  • Explore the land of Ahemfie and learn about an ancient African society
  • Discover the backstories of the characters around you
  • Solve innovative puzzles as you assemble pieces of the Tablet of Djehuti



  • Make life or death decisions that influence the course of your story
  • Harness ancient powers and use them to traverse the world

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 580 2048SP
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Xcode. Targeting Apple Silicon with IL2CPP scripting backend requires macOS Catalina 10.15.4 and Xcode 12.2 or newer.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10750H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 + higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: Samira: Taken From Time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 580 2048SP
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10 SDK.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10750H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 + higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10 SDK.

short_description: Transported back in time, you must help Tiki, an ancient mech beetle, escape the apocalypse. Your puzzle solving skills will be put to the test as you attempt to collect the fragmented pieces of his tablet which will empower him with the ability to stop any and all world-ending events.
